original: intros l m1 m2 H1 H2. unfold canonical in H2. unfold canonical. intros H3 H4. unfold canonical in H2. destruct H2 as [H2 H5]. split. - intros H6. specialize (H2 H6 H3). destruct H2 as [H2 H7]. apply plusTerm_is_pX with (m1:=m1) in H7. apply H7. - intros a Ha. specialize (H5 Ha H4). apply H5.
